title: Can we please give Cass a new skin?
body:
Every time I check for new skins on the PBE I kind of hope they'd be something for the dear snakelady but so far nothing. I was hoping the guys from Riot's art department would be able to come up with something neat for her, heck there are plenty of amazing fan-concepts to choose from already.

It's been 2 1/2 years since she received her last skin (Jade Fang), would it be too much to ask for something new? Pretty please?

replies.body: I think she is definitely getting a special one for Horrowing or Christmas. I'm hoping for a 1350+ skin
